column3: “Wow. For someone who prefers a sativa, Purple Alien OG is one of my all time favorite strains. A couple hits of this heavy hitter will leave you feeling so relaxed and at ease. Depending on what I am doing I can either get major couch lock or be just fine being active. The key is it amplifies whatever you were all ready doing. So sitting on the couch smoking a bowl of PAO and you'll be stuck there all night. Smoking ...”
“my favorite strain hands down. great for pain anxiety and most importantly stress. top shelf strain right here”

“PAO! is right.  This stuff was potent.  I smoke to alleviate pain and to ensure I fall asleep easily.  I probably should have smoked this stuff in bed because the walk from the back yard to my bed was more like a trial on Ninja Warrior.  Smooth smoke via J or via water pipe.  Tasted amazing with slivers from all parts of its parental lineage with the citrus rounding off the flavor.  If you see this strain, TRY IT unl...”

“Now THIS is an indica for chronic pain and complete relaxation. Absolutely LOVE this strain!! Whether you enjoy the beautiful sparkling tricomes that look like they have been dipped in diamond chards, the amazing tone of the dark purple leaves or the fresh berry/grape juice flavour- this strain has what you need! Perfect for those suffering from chronic pain or treatment induced nausea/insomnia. Heavy couch lock, so ...”
“Really good indica hybrid. This stuff beat me up. Great for knocking you out and putting you to sleep. Crazy smooth smoke.”
“This is AMAZING for nausea, acid reflux and IBS. Any digestive or stomach related pain. The strain is a wonderful pain reliever while providing a happy, uplifted and giggly sensation.”

“I picked up some beautiful Purple Alien OG shatter from Native Roots and this strain has quickly become one of my top favorites and a nightly go-to. While I can definitely just be a happy, chill, positive-vibration companion, I am kicking it on the couch, listening to some vinyl, ripping the rig and enjoying my relaxed, mellow, sleepy feel. Definitely a plus for those trying to treat anxiety/insomnia (mine are intert...”

“A very Firey, Flowery Strain, Darker in Color and with beautiful Trichomes.
I really enjoyed the High, which was light and airy. Mixed with Darth Maul  Og, and  Raspberry Kush in a cone rocked my world.”

“A very Firey, Flowery Strain, Darker in Color and with beautiful Trichomes.
I really enjoyed the High, which was light and airy. Mixed with Darth Maul  Og, and  Raspberry Kush in a cone rocked my world.”

“Looks and smells amazing. Super sticky, crystallized nuggets of joy. The two of us, who are well versed in blazing down, were hitting a decent sized doobie, and we decided to put it out halfway. It was that good. Immediate head effects, and body feels pain-free. Taste is almost difficult to describe upon smoking the second half, as it seemed to change throughout. Maybe I'm just high as fuck. We picked ours up from 'M...”

“Funky, trippy, psychedelic weed that spaced me out. This pick was a recommendation from the D's bud man, who lists it as Indica. Big purplish loose packed buds that shred, not grind. It has a tobacco consistency, perfect for rolling. Not great smelling or tasting, horse manure, moldy dirt and magic mushrooms would be the best way to describe my sample. Smoother than expected with a weird, full body, almost visual hig...”

“Great strain! Mine wasn't purple but it was very good weed. Rock hard buds and a little bit goes a long way. This batch I have is far more head than body. Not energetic or racy, just heady. Mine was also called Purple Alien, not Purple Alien OG but I assume they are the same.”
“Very underrated strain which is fine by me”
“smells like lemons n smokes so smooth. Very kiefy buds with a great high”
“Bruhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh”
“Made me very energetic. I had a ton of energy in a very good way. Coming down was nice too, the energy just kind of leveled off. Dry mouth was moderate.”
“Very positive feeling when high. Has a lingering high for quite awhile but not my favorite strain ever. 3.5/5”
“best ive ever had”
“This put me on my ass.....helps with anxiety and sleep very well. Pungent smell even before smoked”
“My neighborhood dispensary was out of Girl Scout Cookies so the counter guy recommended this. It feels a little more Indica but similar high. It's euphoric, cerebral and very happy.”

“Purple Alien OG is fantastic for anyone suffering chronic pain. The buds look like purple grapes that you will want to eat. Great recommendation by Raven, of the Arizona Natural Selections of Peoria dispensary. Thank you!”

“Ok I just Harvested!! I Think to date this was my best!! Very easy to grow! very sticky and sweet smelling. The smoke itself is very strong.Kind of harsh but doesn't expand to much in the lungs. Very euphoric high. Long lasting. I recommend to first time growers. Good Medicine Great for sleeping!!”

“Very heady and slightly paranoid, my brother kept trying to scare the shit outta me tho that's probably why.  Slight body high mainly cerebral though, TL;DR decent strain would smoke again but only if someone else bought it and shared it, I wouldn't buy it myself”
“Amazing.Everything I love about weed is this strain.So beautiful.”
“Made me very energetic. I had a ton of energy in a very good way. Coming down was nice too, the energy just kind of leveled off. Dry mouth was moderate.”
“best ive ever had”
“This put me on my ass.....helps with anxiety and sleep very well. Pungent smell even before smoked”

“Very heady and slightly paranoid, my brother kept trying to scare the shit outta me tho that's probably why.  Slight body high mainly cerebral though, TL;DR decent strain would smoke again but only if someone else bought it and shared it, I wouldn't buy it myself”
“My neighborhood dispensary was out of Girl Scout Cookies so the counter guy recommended this. It feels a little more Indica but similar high. It's euphoric, cerebral and very happy.”
“Decent! ;) Was hoping for a little more high but never mind flying in this UFO 👽”

“I grew this strain as a tester for Gauge Green Group when they sent out the Purple Alien OG cut crossed with their stud, Joe OG, which they have used as their male for all their OG crosses.  

This OG hammer hits you immediately.  Time slows down and relaxation and warm blanket melt over you. Let it go its full 9 weeks and you will be rewarded with a great body high and a heavy confusing indica body high that will al...”
“Very much indica, very much munchies 👍”

“I just grew this beast in beautiful norther california 530 and let me tell you soooooooooo purple and dense as hell I'm talking 2L bottle size buds all over the plant definitely will grow this wee d many times over the high sits you on Saturn and melds you to a couch or even good for a hike with some purple alien og stickyness to transport you there”

“I needed to get to bed and this strain definitely helped.

Not to mention it smells like purple kool-aid and the grow I had was so purple there was literally no green on the bud. It looked out of this world.”
“very nice relaxing high. but still not a total brain fogged.”

“Phenomenal indica, great for afternoons or evenings and pain/tension. Both looks and tastes amazing: smells/tastes like a mix of berry and og, with a surprising (delicious) citrus aftertaste. Great for relaxing muscles, sleep, and I find it very helpful for migraines and nausea. 
Other than MAYBE GDP, this has become my favorite purple.”

“Had this strain freshly cut and given from a friend. The smell is very fresh, a nice grape-like scent to it. As the name implies, there is some purple on the bud.

After a smoke, it tastes pretty good. The effects mainly help in getting easily aroused and good for sex. Otherwise if you just want to unwind, its good for meditative trips if you have a lot. Or just relax and watch the television and have a great laugh...”
“this strain revealed to me the face of the demiurge man.”
“Beautiful dense nugs sugar coated with resin.”
“This shit makes me really relaxed. calmed on the mind. and a bit sleepy.”
“This hoe hit the spot”
“alright .....one thumb up.......”
“The trichomes are crazy on this. Smoke it whenever I need something to knock me out for a good 9-10 hours. Wake up feeling brand new ☺”

“I love this variety of the alien genetics. Since it's crossed with an indica it allows for this strain to be dizzy and unfocused in all the right ways. Personally, I like to do abstract art after smoking this strain and save it for the end of the day. Definitely one you'll remember.”
“Always my goto strand when I'm getting trim at one of my favorite dispensaries”
“Very strong head and body high like effects. Didnt last for as long as I was hoping for a $20 a gram. But I would recommend trying great flavor and overall high.”

“It's very hard rating strains today. There basically nothing that you can call really bad. It's all in what you like. I did the shatter and had a nice punch. Smoked it combined with some  flower the first day. Next day went with the OG alone. I get a 50/50 blend out of this, too much shit going on in my mind at bed time, but really fucking relaxed. Like I said bad shit is more or less a thing of the past.”
“everything”

“Great stand, perfect for relaxing. It also works really well as a pain deterrent. I have large amount of back pain and it helps a lot to keep my mind off the pain. Vaping the flower has a smooth and enjoyable after taste. Highly enjoyable, I will be getting more of this soon.”
“love it! perfect combo. not for everyone but anything 👽 is my fav strain.”
“Helpful with the pain”
“The deepest purple I've ever seen. Very strong.”
“Great smoke. Initially high as hell but the high doesn’t last long.”
“TIS IS A WONDER...hold up....This IS A FIRE ...BLOW UR MIND ......GET STUCK IN A GOOD MOVIE..strain.......bowl of apple jacks perfect”
“It's some gas.”

“After trying a concentrate of this from Roil Extracts, I can say that this is an overall wonderful strain. Great earthy, citrus, sweet tastes. My mind and body feels simultaneously light and heavy, and it's a high functioning strain. If i had to use this on a daily basis, it would be for pain relief or insomnia.”

“Best Strain I've smoked (aside from Northern Lights), you can do anything while your on this strain, but you'll be so high you'll be wondering why you could do it. It is an experience, euphoria, relaxation, sleep, it's got you covered. 

P.S. I wrote this while high as a kite off this strain”

“A nice indica high throughout your whole body. Definitely helps with chronic joint pain and nausea. I like after 1-2 hours, I am ready to go to bed and slept so well. The flower was very beautiful and grown very well.”

“Phenomenal indica, great for afternoons or evenings and pain/tension. Both looks and tastes amazing: smells/tastes like a mix of berry and og, with a surprising (delicious) citrus aftertaste. Great for relaxing muscles, sleep, and I find it very helpful for migraines and nausea. 
Other than MAYBE GDP, this has become my favorite purple.”
“Sabor extravagante”
“This shit makes me really relaxed. calmed on the mind. and a bit sleepy.”
“this strain revealed to me the face of the demiurge man.”

“Had this strain freshly cut and given from a friend. The smell is very fresh, a nice grape-like scent to it. As the name implies, there is some purple on the bud.

After a smoke, it tastes pretty good. The effects mainly help in getting easily aroused and good for sex. Otherwise if you just want to unwind, its good for meditative trips if you have a lot. Or just relax and watch the television and have a great laugh...”
“very nice relaxing high. but still not a total brain fogged.”

“I needed to get to bed and this strain definitely helped.

Not to mention it smells like purple kool-aid and the grow I had was so purple there was literally no green on the bud. It looked out of this world.”

“I just grew this beast in beautiful norther california 530 and let me tell you soooooooooo purple and dense as hell I'm talking 2L bottle size buds all over the plant definitely will grow this wee d many times over the high sits you on Saturn and melds you to a couch or even good for a hike with some purple alien og stickyness to transport you there”
“Very much indica, very much munchies 👍”
“sweet taste and a colour you want believe”
“The homie hooked it up Gotta say this strain foresure one of the best nice relaxing high nice tingly sensation just chilled out listening to rock”
“Wow”
“Tastes amazing.  Great for pain and anxiety.  It is a heavy body stoned so not gonna get a lot done.  A wonderful addition to my meds for the extra bad pain days.”

“Absolutely amazing strain, besides mendo breath I haven't experienced a complete satisfying high in every way possible. A great afternoon or day off strain. Pretty instant. Very flowery lavender taste and smell with a sweet kick. Pressure behind the eyes and lazy feeling couch lock (Tahoe OG) but alert great gaming strain.  I can tell if I smoke slighlty more then I normally do the laziness can easily over take the a...”

“This has a smooth taste and is not harsh at all..
As for the strength I found it to be a little weak.
To me it was just ok. Was expecting a little more.”
“Happy to get some sleep with this strand, but need something more to take the pain away.”
“Beautiful dense nugs sugar coated with resin.”
“Great for after work, allows you to completely forget about the day and enjoy the evening.”
“Great taste, very smooth. Able to efficiently work around the house without pain ruling the day.”
“i love this strain..I have Sickle Cell & this helps with my pain, nausea & appetite!.. It also had me very very relaxed which is what i need when hurting!”
“Awesome Strain!!! Super relaxing strain! This is the kind of strain that you can smoke and have a great body high and not completely couch lock you. Defiantly one of my favorites”

“This is a decent strain.  The flower itself is very unique in appearance particularly prior to harvest.  Her smoke is thick, earthy, coffee, with hints of spice upon exhale.  Relaxed, happy, hungry, with a slight body box is how the intoxication presented itself.  I recommend this flower.”
“Hard to find but amazing effects and flavour.”
“I have a friend who really enjoys this and talks about it as if it's the bee's knees. One of the best buds hes smokes.  Top three for sure.”

“very good herb. overall I expected more of an instant high because of the alien genetics of the strain but I was suprised to find that it has a very mellow initial feeling when taking hits from a bong. I was by no means dissapointed by the flavor of the smoke and the nugs themselves had a very appealing scent. I ended up getting slightly more indica effects and the high culminated with a case of the munchies that I h...”
“Plant looks and smells like good medicine!!I cant wait!”

“This strain hit me in a much different way than anything I've experienced in the past.  Normally, strains that offer pain relief or other physical based effects (Indica dominant) still leave me with a general 'high' feeling.  However, Purple Alien OG seemed to almost perfectly emulate my own natural impulses without any (or very little) in the way of headiness.

It was almost as if PAO camouflaged its presence.  This...”
“Wonderful painkiller”

“Smooth smoking. Sweet. Citrus in background after smoking. 

Quick kick-in, joint pain almost disappeared in hip, Awesome. Giggles. 

Very relaxed, slight couch lock. 

Watched shameless season 1 episode 6, laughed my ass off.”

“Great indica dominant strain! perfect for after work stress relief and after a hard workout to just chill out.  I love growing this strain as well as smoking it because you can really bush it out with almost no stretching in flower.”

“this strain is a gem! its so beautiful to look at. ive never seen buds so purple in my life. nice fat nugs that smell like grapes and lavender. its very euphoric and relaxing. kills my anxiety and stress and gives me that nice warm tingly feeling in my stomach. i love this shit!”

“This one has a kick! She looks beautiful and smells great. We used in the volcano vape for the first time w this strain and wow. It sent me spinning in a good way. Nice smooth high. Hits you slowly but keeps hitting you.”
“313 iRelief s under new Management and their strain of purple alien og was terrific.  It put me in the bed (indica)  like they said it would.  Thumbs up to 313 Relief.”
“this is a really good strain a couple hits and I'm focused as hell on my work ...I felt relieve and calm while on this strain.”
“Very nice strain, beautiful buds! A joint of this and you'll be rocked! Definitely tastes great as well! I recommend this strain to anyone with chronic pain.”
“Like it.  Slow hitting but long high. Creative but not too focused.”
“I cannot believe this strain is for migraines, it gives me headaches! How can something that gives headaches be for migraines?”
